name: Light Sweep
description:
LIGHT SWEEP

After a booze fueled day, the janitor emerges from his favourite bender closet to footsteps and giggles in the corridors. Don’t get swallowed by the shadows, escape the school with your light.

Light Sweep is an exploration puzzle horror game. The school’s lights malfunctioned and you need to have your light plugged in at all times if you are to stand a chance against what is left of the students.

This game was developed by Chicken Pie Games for the GoGodotJam 2 with the theme of Energy Source.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Warning: The web version has no sound due to technical issues beyond our control. Please download your platform's version!
